name: HAT BALLERS
description:
Become the best hat baller ever. Use variety of balls and unique hats to defeat your opponents. Experiment with different shot techniques and styles. Make rainbow shots or just bank it. Shoot from deep, inside or bonus spots.

Unlock new areas and levels by winning games. The higher win the more coins you get. Two stars required to progress, three to unlock items.

Wear unique hats with different skill. Speed is important but will you value it over aiming?

Unlock ball collections. Ball have unique shot arch. Low arch is perfect for bank shots.
